Name: RagnarokUnion
Description: The Ragnarök Union is a microstate in the Barrens region, established in July 3084. It comprises three worlds—Götterdämmerung, Botany Bay, and Last Chance—which were formerly part of the Greater Valkyrate. Under the leadership of Hu Xiao Lin, who maintained her position since before the Clan Invasion, the Union achieved self-sufficiency by leveraging historical ties with Lackhove and Erewhon to access advanced technology. By 3095, the Union operated a cluster of tanks acquired from Clan Jade Falcon; however, efforts to secure training at the Falcon's military academy on Somerset had not yet succeeded.
ReputationStatements: The Ragnarök Union sees you as nothing more than a mercenary outcast, undeserving of trust. If you wish to change that perception, begin by proving yourself useful with this simple task.
You have crossed the Ragnarök Union many times, Commander, and taken the lives of those under our banner. Let us put our history aside. Complete this task and you will be rewarded handsomely.
Commander, your reputation as a warrior precedes you. The Ragnarök Union values strength, and we have a proposition that could benefit us both.
Welcome, Commander. While the Ragnarök Union values its independence, we recognize the need for external support. There's a task that suits your skills perfectly.
Good to see you again, Commander. Our past collaborations have been fruitful, and I have another contract that could further our mutual benefit.
Greetings, my friend. Your skill in combat has greatly aided the Union before. I have another target that needs dealing with—your expertise will ensure success.
Come, Commander. Let us strategize about your next mission. Your valor brings honor to both you and the Union, and the rewards will match the effort.
MissionSuccessStatements: Outstanding work, Commander. You've proven your worth to the Ragnarök Union, and payment is already on its way to your account.
GoodFaithFailureStatements: Commander, this outcome is not what we hoped for, but you displayed courage in the effort. Partial payment is on the way—do better next time.
BadFaithFailureStatements: Your failure reflects poorly on both of us, Commander. We demand competency, and you've proven incapable. Leave before we consider stronger consequences.
